item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

Doesn’t it say on the Soulsplit website or something that they are not afflicted with Jagex in any way? Anyways I think it’s just funny to see their faces when they try to act like they’re doing something important.

The fake board meeting with the graphs doe :palm: :palm: :palm:

item.title: Whenever You Feel Down, Know That You Will Never Be This Dumb
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

I doubt that’s rented. I’d guess someone in his family or the family of one of his closest friends has a high position in the company that building is for.

De Hypotheker is a Dutch firm that rents out money for people to buy real estate
https://www.hypotheker.nl/

item.title: Whenever You Feel Down, Know That You Will Never Be This Dumb
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

That’s like anything illegal, I’m allowed to talk about any controlled substance, but as soon as I start typing dealers contact details I’m getting into trouble. I’ve heard about the Jagex taking a cut rumour, but I’m still curious what the cold hard truth is.

Read full topic
item.source: Whenever You Feel Down, Know That You Will Never Be This Dumb

item.title: Whenever You Feel Down, Know That You Will Never Be This Dumb
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:8, topic:550985”][quote author=naseem142 link=topic=669902.msg4479546#msg4479546 date=1428661022]

So wait, they set up an actual company that is obviously profit run for a rsps? How have jagex not rm -rf’ed this?

because it’s bullshit , if they were really making that much profit from a rsps jagex would penetrate their arses with lawsuits.
[/quote]

Well to supposedly “employ” all these people and buy new imacs and rent out a fricking office they’re not doing too bad. Definitely better than the usual 12 year old kid buying a vps with his daddy’s credit card and accepting $5 donations every once in a while. Profit aside, the turnover they must be generating to afford the aforementioned stuff is rather significant - I wonder if Jagex really don’t give a fudge.[/quote]

Idk if it’s ran by jagex or what not… But if you go onto the runescape reddit, it says you may freely talk about a RSPS there, as long as you do not advertise it… So idk.

Read full topic
item.source: Whenever You Feel Down, Know That You Will Never Be This Dumb

item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

iirc there were two supposed rumors going around, one was that the dad of the guy that owned SoulSplit was really rich and just bought a lot of stuff for him to support his “hobby”, the other rumor was that jagex had a deal with soul split to let them keep going for a cut of their profits

item.title: Whenever You Feel Down, Know That You Will Never Be This Dumb
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

[quote=“naseem142, post:7, topic:550985”][quote author=Fat Cookies link=topic=669902.msg4479544#msg4479544 date=1428660686]
So wait, they set up an actual company that is obviously profit run for a rsps? How have jagex not rm -rf’ed this?
[/quote]

because it’s bullshit , if they were really making that much profit from a rsps jagex would penetrate their arses with lawsuits.[/quote]

Well to supposedly “employ” all these people and buy new imacs and rent out a fricking office they’re not doing too bad. Definitely better than the usual 12 year old kid buying a vps with his daddy’s credit card and accepting $5 donations every once in a while. Profit aside, the turnover they must be generating to afford the aforementioned stuff is rather significant - I wonder if Jagex really don’t give a fuck.

@stCky wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:550985”]90% of the video is the camera panning through a room. lmfao.

I love how serious they try to be, especially the part where the guy is concentrating on the screen and not typing shit (30 seconds into the video). He’s just staring at a blank email like “act cool, the camera is on you. don’t blow this”[/quote]

This bit actually had me nearly in tears!

They gotta get on that http://hackertyper.com/ steez
